description: A new member of Gourmet Knights and highly skilled in martial arts, he joins Toriko`s party as they enter the Ice Hell in search of Century Soup, as he needs money to buy medicine for Aimaru. There he faces off against Bogie Woods. He once suffers a disease from the Gourmet World, which are referred to as curses because known science has no cure for them. Aimaru consumes the disease and leaves only one of his eyes infected, at great personal expense.
name: Takimaru
